title: Camping Gear Quiz
description: How well do you know camping equipment and outdoor gear? Test your knowledge of essential camping items.

questions.question: What camping item is a portable shelter made of fabric supported by poles and secured with stakes?
Which camping gear item is an insulated bag designed for sleeping outdoors?
What is a camp stove used for?
options: Cooking food and boiling water at a campsite

questions.question: Which navigation tool uses a magnetized needle to indicate direction?
What camping item is an inflatable or foam pad placed under a sleeping bag for insulation and comfort?
Which portable light source is worn on the forehead, leaving both hands free?
What is a multi-tool (like a Swiss Army knife) valued for in camping?
options: Having multiple tools (knife, pliers, screwdriver, etc.) in one compact device

questions.question: Which container keeps beverages hot or cold for extended periods using vacuum insulation?
What is a bear canister used for?
options: Storing food in a hard-sided container to keep it safe from bears

questions.question: Which device purifies water from natural sources, making it safe to drink?
What is a tarp used for in camping?
options: As a versatile shelter, ground cover, or rain fly

questions.question: Which fire-starting tool creates sparks when scraped with a metal striker?
What is a carabiner clip commonly used for in camping?
options: Quickly attaching and detaching gear to packs and lines

questions.question: Which camping cookware item is a lightweight metal cup that can also be used for cooking over a fire?
What is paracord (parachute cord) valued for in camping?
options: Its strength and versatility for tying, securing, and emergency uses
